teacherlanding.title: Оқытушыларға арналған Скретч
teacherlanding.intro: Your students can use Scratch to code their own interactive stories, animations, and games. In the process, they learn to think creatively, reason systematically, and work collaboratively — essential skills for everyone in today’s society.
teacherlanding.generalUsageGradeLevels: Сынып деңгейлері: бастауыш, орта және жоғары мектеп (тіпті кейбір колледждер де!)
teacherlanding.generalUsageSubjectAreas: Пәндік бағыттар: тіл өнері, ғылым, әлеуметтік зерттеулер, математика, информатика, шет тілдері, және өнер
teacherlanding.scratchEdDescription: ScratchEd is an online community where Scratch educators share stories, exchange resources, ask questions, and find people. ScratchEd is developed and supported by the Harvard Graduate School of Education.
teacherlanding.meetupDescription: Scratch Educator Meetups are gatherings of Scratch Educators who want to learn with and from each other, sharing their ideas and strategies for supporting computational creativity in all its forms.
teacherlanding.tttPage: The Tips page offers a variety of tutorials, activity cards, and educator guides.
teacherlanding.tipsWindow: Кеңес терезесі Скретчте жоба жасауға көмек көрсетеді.
teacherlanding.creativeComputing: Креативті Есептеу Оқу Жоспары Нұсқаулығы жоспарлар, іс-шаралар мен креативті есептеу енгізу стратегияларын ұсынады.
teacherlanding.accountsDescription: As an educator, you can request a Scratch Teacher Account, which makes it easier to create accounts for groups of students and to manage your students’ projects and comments. To learn more, see the Teacher Account FAQ page.
